dcterms:description: OPRA contains videos of product reviews of appliances collected from YouTube, with each instance being a short video demonstration paired with a static image of the product, an interaction label, and a manually created affordance heatmap.
dcterms:title: OPRA

dcterms:description: EPIC-Kitchens contains unscripted, egocentric videos of activities in a kitchen, annotated with action and object labels along with bounding boxes for objects being interacted with.
dcterms:title: EPIC-Kitchens
